name: Tea Time (yeoji)
description:
It's tea time, and there are customers waiting patiently for a cup of warm goodness.

Each customer will request either the black tea, or the green tea.

  • Black tea has an ideal water temperature of 100C
  • Green tea has an ideal water temperature of 80C

Turn on the kettle with a click, and watch the temperatures closely as they rise.

Drag the kettle to the customer to pour them the perfect cup of tea.

And always remember, temperature is key :)
